p: Ethanol (EtOH), methanol (MeOH), hexane, and ethyl acetate (EA) were purchased from Samchun Pure Chemical, Pyeongtaek, Korea. Diethyl ether (DE) and dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, Yongin, Korea. Luria-Bertani (LB) broth and streptomycin sulfate was purchased from MB cell, Seoul, Korea.
